abstract: Gordon Douglas 1966 remake of popular John Ford movie Stagecoach will be released as limited edition DVD from boutique label Twilight Time; reprising John Wayne's iconic role in original version was brave move for then unknown actor Alex Cord.
snippet: When Alex Cord agreed to play the John Wayne role in the 1966 remake of “Stagecoach,” it seemed like an engraved invitation to commit career suicide.
lead_paragraph: When Alex Cord agreed to play the John Wayne role in the 1966 remake of “Stagecoach,” it seemed like an engraved invitation to commit career suicide.

headline.main: The Man Who Dared to Fill John Wayne’s Boots
headline.print_headline: The Man Who Dared to Fill John Wayne’s Boots
headline.seo: John Wayne and Alex Cord: Two Ringo Kids of ‘Stagecoach’
